instructions: Put the plate in the middle of the charger
Put the napkin on the plate
Put the dinner fork to the left of the charger vertically, tines pointing upward
Put the salad fork to the left of the charger and left of the dinner fork, next to the dinner fork, tines pointing upward.
Put the dinner knife to the right of the charger horizontally, blade pointing upward.
Put the tea spoon to the right of the dinner knife horizontally, bowl pointing upward.
Put the soup spoon next and to the right of the tea spoon, bowl upward, horizontally.
Put the water glass to the upper right side of the charger.
Put the wine glass to the right of the water glass.
Put the wine glass above the tea spoon and soup spoon.
Put the coffee cup to the right of the wine glass.
Put the bread plate to the upper left of the charger, parallel to the coffee cup.
Put the butter knife on the bread plate horizontally.
Put the dessert fork between the bread plate and water glass vertically above the charger, tines pointing to the water glass.
Put the dessert spoon above the charger, to the left of the water glass, bowl pointing to the bread plate.
